messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2372
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/13/2002 2:07:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Try Algebra Unplugged before or with any algebra material .... it isn t a textbook/math
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/13/2002 2:07:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Conor said this to me recently after we were talking about the difference
> between arithmetic and higher math thinking. He said algebra sounds like
> fun
> and he'd like to try it. I'll probably get some "Key To" books. The real
> unschooling trick, though, is to not care if he ever opens them.

Try Algebra Unplugged before or with any algebra material .... it isn't a
textbook/math practice book - it is "about" algebra. Pretty readable, unlike
most math books.

-pam

National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
